content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":22791,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あいつ、もう俺には勝てんぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"He can't beat me anymore."},{"lineNumber":22792,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まー、そうかもしれませんねぇ……","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, that might be true..."},{"lineNumber":22793,"originalJapaneseLine":"　はあ……馬鹿だなぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hah... what an idiot..."},{"lineNumber":22794,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったくだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Exactly."},{"lineNumber":22795,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんなやつより俺の方が勇者に相応しいだろうに。","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm more worthy of being the hero than someone like him."},{"lineNumber":22796,"originalJapaneseLine":"　がはははははは」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":22797,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……それはどうですかね」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Is that so?"},{"lineNumber":22798,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh?"},{"lineNumber":22799,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ。んじゃ、これで。もう、最後かな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"No, well then, this is it. Maybe this is the end..."},{"lineNumber":22800,"originalJapaneseLine":"呟くように言い残すと、","translatedEnglishLine":"Leaving those words behind as a murmur,"},{"lineNumber":22801,"originalJapaneseLine":"コーラはひょいと穴の中に飛び込んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kola lightly jumped into the hole."},{"lineNumber":22802,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおっ。自殺しやがった」","translatedEnglishLine":"Whoa. He’s committed suicide."},{"lineNumber":22803,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ、生きているでしょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"No, he should still be alive."},{"lineNumber":22804,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうなのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is that so?"},{"lineNumber":22805,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes."},{"lineNumber":22806,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん……まあいい。時間がない、さっさと行くぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmph... whatever. We don't have time, let's move quickly."},{"lineNumber":22807,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アリオス……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Arios..."},{"lineNumber":22808,"originalJapaneseLine":"口を開いて、言葉を投げかけようとして。","translatedEnglishLine":"He opened his mouth to say something."},{"lineNumber":22809,"originalJapaneseLine":"投げかけるべきものを見つけられないまま、","translatedEnglishLine":"But unable to find the words to say,"},{"lineNumber":22810,"originalJapaneseLine":"セシルはアリオスの消えた先をじっと見つめていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Cecil quietly stared at the place where Arios had disappeared."},{"lineNumber":22811,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス一行は、再び進み始めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and his party began moving forward again."},{"lineNumber":22812,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":22813,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":22814,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":22815,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜ぴちょん……＞","translatedEnglishLine":"<splash...>"},{"lineNumber":22816,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、っ…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh..."},{"lineNumber":22817,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぼんやりとした光がまぶたを刺して、","translatedEnglishLine":"A faint light pierced his eyelids,"},{"lineNumber":22818,"originalJapaneseLine":"アリオスはゆっくりを目を開いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Arios slowly opened his eyes."},{"lineNumber":22819,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ……目を覚ましました？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah... you woke up?"},{"lineNumber":22820,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……コーラ？　今、背中から光が……」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Kola? Just now, there was light coming from my back..."},{"lineNumber":22821,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんのことです？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What are you talking about?"},{"lineNumber":22822,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや……気のせいならいい」","translatedEnglishLine":"No... if it’s just my imagination, then it’s fine."},{"lineNumber":22823,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうにか、アリオスは身体を起こす。","translatedEnglishLine":"Somehow, Arios managed to sit up."},{"lineNumber":22824,"originalJapaneseLine":"相当な高さから滑落したらしい。","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems he fell from a considerable height."},{"lineNumber":22825,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、強かったですねぇ、ランス」","translatedEnglishLine":"No, you were strong, Rance."},{"lineNumber":22826,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………ああ。だが、まだ終わらない。","translatedEnglishLine":"...Yeah. But it's not over yet."},{"lineNumber":22827,"originalJapaneseLine":"　このままでは、っ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"If things stay like this..."},{"lineNumber":22828,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや……終わりですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"No... it’s over."},{"lineNumber":22829,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……なに？」","translatedEnglishLine":"...What?"},{"lineNumber":22830,"originalJapaneseLine":"「時間切れ、ですね。","translatedEnglishLine":"You’re out of time."},{"lineNumber":22831,"originalJapaneseLine":"　エスクードソード、持てます？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Can you hold the Escudo Sword?"},{"lineNumber":22832,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":22833,"originalJapaneseLine":"傍らに転がっていた勇者の剣を、掴む。","translatedEnglishLine":"He grabbed the hero's sword lying beside him."},{"lineNumber":22834,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐっ…………！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Guh...!?"},{"lineNumber":22835,"originalJapaneseLine":"片手で、自在に操っていたはずの剣が……","translatedEnglishLine":"The sword he should have been able to wield freely with one hand..."},{"lineNumber":22836,"originalJapaneseLine":"まるっきり、持てない。","translatedEnglishLine":"He couldn’t hold it at all."},{"lineNumber":22837,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの日……アリオスが勇者に戻った日に","translatedEnglishLine":"That day... the day Arios returned as the hero,"},{"lineNumber":22838,"originalJapaneseLine":"触れた感触に、酷似していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"It felt exactly the same as when he touched it then."},{"lineNumber":22839,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……まさか…………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"...No way...!"},{"lineNumber":22840,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい。そのまさかです。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes. That’s exactly what it is."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいつ、もう俺には勝てんぞ」
「まー、そうかもしれませんねぇ……
あんなやつより俺の方が勇者に相応しいだろうに。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm more worthy of being the hero than someone like him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ。んじゃ、これで。もう、最後かな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, well then, this is it. Maybe this is the end...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呟くように言い残すと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leaving those words behind as a murmur,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コーラはひょいと穴の中に飛び込んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kola lightly jumped into the hole.
No, he should still be alive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん……まあいい。時間がない、さっさと行くぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph... whatever. We don't have time, let's move quickly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 口を開いて、言葉を投げかけようとして。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He opened his mouth to say something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 投げかけるべきものを見つけられないまま、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But unable to find the words to say,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルはアリオスの消えた先をじっと見つめていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil quietly stared at the place where Arios had disappeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス一行は、再び進み始めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and his party began moving forward again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぼんやりとした光がまぶたを刺して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A faint light pierced his eyelids,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アリオスはゆっくりを目を開いた。
「……コーラ？　今、背中から光が……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Kola? Just now, there was light coming from my back...
No... if it’s just my imagination, then it’s fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうにか、アリオスは身体を起こす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow, Arios managed to sit up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相当な高さから滑落したらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems he fell from a considerable height.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、強かったですねぇ、ランス」
エスクードソード、持てます？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Can you hold the Escudo Sword?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傍らに転がっていた勇者の剣を、掴む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He grabbed the hero's sword lying beside him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 片手で、自在に操っていたはずの剣が……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sword he should have been able to wield freely with one hand...
He couldn’t hold it at all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの日……アリオスが勇者に戻った日に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That day... the day Arios returned as the hero,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 触れた感触に、酷似していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It felt exactly the same as when he touched it then.
Yes. That’s exactly what it is.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
